author: nishant0
content:
You can actually determine proposer assingnments an epoch back with a very high probability. Proposer index computation requires 3 things: 
- Randao mix of the (n-2) epoch
- Active indices
- Effective balances

Active indices have a 2 epoch active/exit delay while effective balances change at the end of each epoch. Effective balances change very rarely in mainnet and usually would only be decreased in the event of a slashing  or continious penalty.  Using these 3 things, you could precompute proposer assignments in advance.
